sentences.sContent: Hello little antelope, would you like to play with us?
sentences.sContent_eng: Hello little antelope, would you like to play with us?
sentences.sCn: 你好，小羚羊，愿意跟我们一起玩吗？

sentences.sContent: "The marks on the inside of one antelope jaw showed they cut out the tongue, " White said.
sentences.sContent_eng: "The marks on the inside of one antelope jaw showed they cut out the tongue, " White said.
sentences.sCn: “一块羚羊颌骨内部的痕迹表明，这些原始人曾将它的舌头割了去，”怀特说。

trans.tranOther: an animal with long horns that can run very fast and is very graceful
